summary: SIDE MIRRORS ARE TOO TALL AND TOO SHORT! WE ALMOST GOT INTO ACCIDENT FOR SEVERAL TIMES BEFORE BUT YESTERDAY (7/17/17) WAS REALLY CLOSE! I WAS CHANGING TO RIGHT LANE WHEN ANOTHER CAR IS SO CLOSE I HAVE TO SLAM MY BRAKES BECAUSE MY PASSENGER MIRROR IS SO BAD ABOUT VISIBILITY. PLEASE HELP BEFORE WE GET HURT OR WORSE. THANK YOU!
